long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate Google review link, find GMB categories, GBP SEO audit, crush your GMB competitor with this useful local SEO audit tool.

# GMB Audit
It will allow you to check the most important business details are included in the GMB listing in just one-click. GMB Audit helps you see what your competitors are doing.

# Basic Information Audit
- Business claimed status
- Latitude and longitude
- Location details (The human-readable address of this place.)
- Google Maps place Id (A Place Id is a textual identifier that uniquely identifies a place.)
- Question and answers links
- Review link (the review url of GMB)
- Write review link (the review form url of GMB)
- Google Knowledge panel link (Google Knowledge panels are information boxes that appear on Google when you search for entities (people, places, businesses, things) that are in the Knowledge Graph.)

# More advanced links
- SEO audit links
- Website details audit links

# Contact us:
Do you have an idea for making GMB Audit better? We'd love to hear about it!
https://www.getgmbaudit.com

# Important Note: 
GMB Audit does NOT belong or related to the official Google Maps application/website in any ways. It is an unofficial app that is developed and maintained independently.
